div.head: Borders of a garden
div.ab: One needs to work the earth, then make it thinner with the rake. And next, if it is dry, one needs to moisten it. Then, stretch the cord very close, and hit on the entire length of the cord as with the back of a pruning knife, in order that the cord marks a straight line, the length of which you will un bord make holes with an iron stake where you will plant your rosemary. Behead & cut to measure, and prune from the bottom up.
